description: Memory Bank optimization and archive structure implementation
details: Created archive files (archiveContext.md and progressHistory.md) to store historical information
Streamlined activeContext.md and progress.md to focus on current and upcoming work
Added Memory Bank Archive Guidelines to systemPatterns.md
Implemented clear archiving policy and access protocols
Updated all version numbers and timestamps
Created verification tracker to ensure no information was lost

impact.memory_bank: Improved efficiency by reducing context load while preserving complete history
impact.development: Enhanced focus on current tasks and upcoming work
impact.documentation: Added clear guidelines for archive access and maintenance
